casebody.data:
PALMER, GAL for Fuentes
v.
JACKSON. No. 336PA03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. John F. Morris, Keith B. Nichols, Charlotte, for W. Brent Jackson d/b/a Jackson's Farming Company and Companion Property and Casualty. Celia Grasty Lata, Special Deputy Attorney General, Brent D. Kiziah, Assistant Attorney General, for UNC Hospitals, UNC Phys. & Assoc. Francisco J. Bricio, Gary, for Palmer. Melanie M. Hamilton, Wendell H. Ott, Greensboro, for Health Care Providers, Hospitals.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of December 2003 by NC Ins. Guaranty Assoc. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2004."
